text: Nunc igitur capitalia crimina explicabo, prima superbia sicut scriptum estnu æfter þas senne deplice her beginneþ, þæt is erest ofermodnesse swa hit gewriten is.

Initium omnis peccati superbia, de cuius radice oritur inanis gloria, inuidia, ira, logo tempore, tristitia sæculi, auaritia, uentris ingluuies, luxuriaon from þe ealle senne ofermodnesse, of <hwam> orieten lest wuldor ofþanc yrre, les worold, dryrinese þis woruld, festenesse, wambe oferfylnesse, lichamnan <lustgeornesse>.
